question:
Consider the following statements about the African Asian Rural Development Organization (AARDO):
  1. It is an autonomous, inter-Governmental organization established in 1962
  2. It has its headquarters in New Delhi
  3. India is one of the Founder Members of the Organization
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: The African Asian Rural Development Organization (AARDO) is an autonomous, inter-Governmental organization established in 1962 with the objective of promoting cooperation among the countries of the African – Asian Region. The African Asian Rural Development Organization (AARDO) for capacity building programmes in the field of rural development. India is one of its founder members and its headquarters are located in New Delhi. Recently, Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi has given its approval to the signing of a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) between India and the African Asian Rural Development Organization (AARDO) for the triennium 2015 – 2017 in the direction of eradicating thirst, hunger, illiteracy, disease and poverty in the region.
